page.title: 12A school survey
page.content: A school survey has revealed some interesting results. Pocket money.Pocket money was usually paid weekly on a Saturday.Amounts vary from 10p to Â£5 but the popular sum was between Â£1 and Â£2 Hobbies.The most popular hobby was swimming,followed by playing football.Other hobbies include riding BMX bikes,reading,roller and ice skating,computers and collecting stickers. Housing.People mainly live in three bedroomed semi-detached houses,built in the last 10 years,heated by gas and having a garage. Employment.The most common job for women was nursing and for men was working in the chemical industry.Most people worked in Grimsby with Scunthorpe next.Only 5 people worked on oil rigs.
